category.name: Interface.Rich Client
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_wc_show_all
preference.preference_description: Defines the content of the list of Work Contexts associated to a user. Valid values for this site preference are: - FALSE (default) to display only Work Contexts related to the tasks in the user's Task to Perform folder. - TRUE to display Work Contexts related to the tasks in the user's Task to Perform folder, followed by any other Work Contexts created by the user.
